Speaker: Affecto
Text: I understand how concerning this must feel, Alex. A positive FOBT result means that a small amount of blood was found in your stool. This can be caused by various things, many of which aren’t serious. The important thing to remember is that this is just the first step in understanding what’s going on, and it’s great that you’re following up on it.

Speaker: Affecto
Text: It is totally natural to be worried, Alex, but a positive FOBT doesn’t necessarily mean cancer. There are several other possible reasons for finding blood, such as polyps or inflammation, many of which are easily treatable. The colonoscopy will give a clearer picture, and taking this step now is the best way to ensure you stay healthy
